title: 怎么获取游戏中光标所指定的人物的Entity
author: myJavaWorld
txt_content: 想要在光标指定人物时，可以获取到这个被指定的任务Entity实体，怎么获得？？在线等，谢谢各位大佬

replies.author: sjx
replies.txt_content:
说清楚是 Mod 还是插件？
如果是 Mod，那么可以用 net.minecraft.world.World.rayTraceBlocks(Vec3d, Vec3d, boolean, boolean, boolean)
如果是插件，那么可以参考一下 bukkit - How would I detect if a player is looking at another entity? - Stack Overflow

replies.author: myJavaWorld
replies.txt_content:
sjx 发表于 2018-7-17 19:16
